cu.explanation_en: Setting GNB_PORT_FOR_S1U to 99999 (exceeding valid port range) will cause invalid network interface configuration and S1-U connection failures.

du.explanation_en: Setting pMax to 100 dBm (exceeding valid range) will cause invalid maximum power configuration and uplink transmission failures.
du.explanation_zh: 將 pMax 設定為 100 dBm（超出有效範圍）會導致無效的最大功率配置和上行鏈路傳輸失敗。
